TopicTitle: 1.2.2 crashing on loading (RSS/RO/RP-0 install)...at a loss

Articles.Content:
Since RO got released to CKAN, I reinstalled KSP and then installed RO/RSS from CKAN, and added in RP-0 and dependencies manually.  The game keeps crashing during loading and I'm kind of at a loss after several different tries.  I'm probably missing something simple, here is the output_log from the crash- https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B6AubkMOT5rrdWJ5Zk8yVDc4UWs.  Any and all help would be greatly appreciated. 

As a side note, I'd be very interested to learn where people look in logs for issues, what stands out, etc. If someone felt like explaining that I'd be eager to learn more.  Thanks!

It looks like you have KIS 1.5, probably recommended from CKAN. I had this issue earlier and it took me a while to figure out what was going on, KIS 1.5 is built for version 1.3 of KSP and will crash older versions. I assume you are on 1.2.2 for RO. Get a version of KIS for 1.2 and add it manually.

14 hours ago, Tynrael said:

It looks like you have KIS 1.5, probably recommended from CKAN. I had this issue earlier and it took me a while to figure out what was going on, KIS 1.5 is built for version 1.3 of KSP and will crash older versions. I assume you are on 1.2.2 for RO. Get a version of KIS for 1.2 and add it manually.

Thanks, I don't think I'd have ever figured that one out.  Much appreciated!
